---
name: Pull Request
about: Use this template for pull requests to improve clarity and review speed
---

## Summary

Provide a short description of the change and the reason behind it.

## Related issue

Resolve or reference related issue(s): `Closes #<issue>` or `Refs #<issue>`

## Type of change

- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Chore

## Testing

- Describe how this change was tested and any setup required.

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (`npm test` / `pytest`)
- [ ] Linter passed (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] DCO signed on commits
- [ ] CLA signed or signature pending
- [ ] Changelog/release notes updated if appropriate

> When ready, request reviewers and include any screenshots or logs that help with review.
